scripts.bootstrap: npm run _tmp_preinstall && npm i && npm run link:cli
scripts.link:cli: cd packages/cli && npm rm -g prisma2-multi-tenant && npm link
scripts.link:remove: npm ls -g && npm rm -g prisma2-multi-tenant @prisma2-multi-tenant/client @prisma2-multi-tenant/shared && npm ls -g
scripts.test: npm run test:cli && npm run test:client
scripts._tmp_preinstall: rd /s /q packages\cli\build && mkdir packages\cli\build && call >> packages\cli\build\index.js
